artists.name: Wizkid
artists.description: Ayodeji Ibrahim Balogun, known professionally as Wizkid, is a Nigerian singer and songwriter.

artists.name: Burna Boy
artists.description: Damini Ebunoluwa Ogulu, known professionally as Burna Boy, is a Nigerian singer, songwriter and record producer.

artists.name: Davido
artists.description: David Adedeji Adeleke, popularly known as Davido, is a Nigerian-American singer, songwriter and record producer.

artists.name: Tiwa Savage
artists.description: Tiwatope Savage, known professionally as Tiwa Savage, is a Nigerian singer, songwriter and actress.

artists.name: Diamond Platnumz
artists.description: Nasibu Abdul Juma Issack, popularly known by his stage name Diamond Platnumz, is a Tanzanian bongo flava recording artist.

artists.name: Sauti Sol
artists.description: Sauti Sol is a Kenyan afro-pop band formed in Nairobi by vocalists Bien-Aimé Baraza, Willis Chimano and Savara Mudigi.

artists.name: Master KG
artists.description: Kgaogelo Moagi, known professionally as Master KG, is a South African musician and record producer.

artists.name: Stonebwoy
artists.description: Livingstone Etse Satekla, better known by his stage name Stonebwoy, is a Ghanaian Afropop, dancehall and reggae musician.

artists.name: Shatta Wale
artists.description: Charles Nii Armah Mensah Jr., known by his stage name Shatta Wale, is a Ghanaian reggae-dancehall artist.

artists.name: Sarkodie
artists.description: Michael Owusu Addo, known professionally as Sarkodie, is a Ghanaian rapper, songwriter and entrepreneur.

artists.name: Nasty C
artists.description: Nsikayesizwe David Junior Ngcobo, known professionally as Nasty C, is a South African rapper, songwriter and record producer.

artists.name: Cassper Nyovest
artists.description: Refiloe Maele Phoolo, professionally known as Cassper Nyovest, is a South African rapper, songwriter, entrepreneur and record producer.

artists.name: Angelique Kidjo
artists.description: Angélique Kidjo is a Beninese singer-songwriter, actress, and activist who is noted for her diverse musical influences.

artists.name: Youssou N'Dour
artists.description: Youssou N'Dour is a Senegalese singer, songwriter, composer, occasional actor, businessman, and politician.

artists.name: Fally Ipupa
artists.description: Fally Ipupa N'simba, known by his stage name Fally Ipupa, is a Congolese singer-songwriter, dancer, philanthropist, guitarist and producer.
